text: Based on reviews of tech sources like Ars Technica, Wired, and Forbes, plus X discussions and the project's GitHub history, Clawdbot/Moltbot/OpenClaw appears to be a genuine open-source AI agent project by developer Peter Steinberger. It gained organic viral traction via demos
